zone.line: Who over nature & thier holy circles
In honesty, yet according to his knowledge
With whimsical toil meditated.
He in the company of adepts
Himself in swarthy laboratory locked
And with endless reciepts
The contrariety united.
a bold suitor
In warm bath, the lilies painted
And both then with open flame pit
To the bridal chamber into the flame melted
Appears theron, with various colours
The young queen in glass
Here was the remedy, the patients die
And no one asks: who recovers?
So have we with hellish electuary
In these vales, in these towns,
Far worse than the plague raged.
I have myself poisons to thousands given
They decay here, I must live to see
— That none the bold murder praises
